reviewText: I thought I had already seen the worst sex DVD ever make but I was wrong.  In terms of garbage DVDs this one has to be the worse.  I wouldn't give this to my worst enemy.  Buy LONESOME DOVE or some other good movie.
Just clips of women masturbating - no real detail or even discussion about ejaculation or the G-spot.

I bought this movie for my wife to  help her undo the negative religious/conservative guilt and other negativeness that living in a reactionary part of Pennsylvania (everything west of the Philadelphia and east of Pittsburgh) brings with it towards female sexuality.  I was not turned on by it, but found it helpful to me with some of my less than stellar attitudes.

What a great way to learn about pleasure and learn what works for women. Sharing from a variety of experiences gives so much scope to the process in a way that is not glossed over for entertainment! It is for education and it opens one up to knowing how to have a more fulfilling sex life.
Not as good as some other titles by the same company - poor editing, scenes are choppy.  Hard to watch.

Good if you and your partner enjoy watching what make women "tick" or have a good time, not so good if your looking to learn a "secret" about the female orgasm, though the women do open up about what they enjoy. Decent production value, though a bit dated.
